website_summaries.verdict: These innovative headrest hooks convert to a phone holder for hands-free entertainment. You only get 2, but if you love convenience, they might be worth it.
pros: Convertible design works as a regular headrest hook or a phone holder
Swings inward to save space when not in use
Silicone padding allows for a secure fit and prevents scrapes
Holds a good deal of weight
cons: They're a bit short and the hanging function can be awkward on wide backrests

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Normei Headrest Hooks to hang my purse so it wouldn't have to ride in the passengers foot well. My original order was missing one of the extra silicone pieces that go on the headrest pillar. Normei has excellent customer service and solved my problem at once. I installed the hooks in my car and the work great. They are long enough to accommodate a two handled purse. Plus, they have locks so as not to come off at inappropriate times. I am quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jacey St. Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great Hooks
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are very sturdy. They fit my Hyundai Palisade. My 2 strap purse fits well behind the passenger seat on the hook. I was able to secure my Note 9 on one hook. It took a few minutes to figure out how to pull up the latch for my phone. I had to push the lever in, pull down and around. I would recommend these hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Hopewell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and now I have a place to put my purse, without worrying about it tossing around or getting stepped on in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Best product for SUV
customer_reviews.text: I have these in previous car and when I purchased new one these were first thing I added. The phone holder portion works nice . Love these
customer_reviews.author: Paula B

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: great purchase. using it one as a phone holder for the kids to watch videos and the other to hold my purse. awesome!
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So worth the purchase I purchased to use for the phones in the back used as a mini tablet.

customer_reviews.title: headrest holders
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item excellent seller will definitely buy again for gifts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purse holder
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for holding my purse!! No more purse spilling over in the back. Extra bonus was my son loved the way it held his tablet! It was easy to put on too!

customer_reviews.title: broke several times.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, and loved using it for various items, yet continually had to reassemble the parts.

customer_reviews.title: Organization
customer_reviews.text: Love these hooks. Keeps my vehicle more organized. I hang my jacket/coat on it. Child uses it to hold phone. Have a reusable bag that child keeps items and snacks in it and stays organized. Have not tried hanging work bag (which contains 15” laptop) only because I feel it will make dent in seat.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great use it as a phone holder for the back seat Tight grip phone doesn't fall off. Even though it says it won't fit Tundra ,it did fit perfectly on the headrest.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I faced it forward to hang my purse on the front of the passenger seat.

customer_reviews.text: Very bummed they didn’t fit my headrest. They seemed sturdy and would have worked geat if they fit...

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! This thing holds your phone, grocery bags, purse... you name it. It is super sleek and sometimes I forget it’s there to use. Comes in handy, happy I got it! Get one!

customer_reviews.title: Car hooks
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to hang a jacket, my purse, and grocery bags!

customer_reviews.title: Good for grocery bags
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can turn these into either a oh ok ne holder or bag holder, so you can have 2 bag holders or 2 phone holders or one of each. I got these to hold my grocery bags and they have been really convenient as opposed to putting them in the trunk.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to install and remove. Works as discribed. No more purse on the floor or in the seat for someone to hold. Kids love the hands free for youtube.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are so convenient. Love being able to hang my purse on this & not having it tump over!

customer_reviews.title: exactly as it is described
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Bought this to hold my kids backpacks in the car. I love that it doubles as a cell phone holder as well. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Schonert

customer_reviews.title: Base to Rigid
customer_reviews.text: The base needs to be recessed to fit over the button, so the headrest doesn't have to ride so high. The longer size is good.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald M. O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Low quakity 1 of 2 brake in less than the second week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am totally happy with my purchase from Normei! This hook is the answer to that problem - where to put my purse. The hook fit the headrest perfect and it took about 2 seconds to put it on. My purse is heavy and it held it just fine. I definitely recommend this product. Someone had the perfect idea. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mshelton

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick
customer_reviews.text: Now I can hang my purse and packages so they won't fall over. Depending on the depth of you backseat and the length of the hanging object's handles, they can interfere with the backseat passenger. We haven't had a chance to use the phone holder yet. These would have been great when my kids were younger and needed/wanted to watch their videos/movies/whatever.
customer_reviews.author: A&N's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks. I often have friends riding with me and I usually throw my purse on the floor in front of the backseat. Inevitably, I end up not being able to reach it later or it falls over and spills. If I try and keep it with me upfront, it crowds whoever and still may spill over. Now I hang my purse on the nifty little hook. I can reach into it if I need to and everything stays inside during the whole trip. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day, it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Sturdy hook holds my very heavy handbag in place so that it doesn't fall on the floor or spill when I hit the brakes. I haven't used the option of having this hold my iPhone for me - I just use it as a hook for my handbag. It's excellent and I love how it doesn't crush the leather handbag straps, as my old wire headrest hooks did. I would definitely buy this again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beecher

customer_reviews.title: Smart gadget at a great price & multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine to hold grocery bags and my reusable trash bag. It's convenient and easy to set up and the nifty phone holder clip that pops out from underneath is an added bonus. The hardest decision is whether to buy the set of 2 or 4.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's super easy to install; it took no effort. It holds my heavy purse just fine. It goes from side to side easily because it fits loosely to my headrest posts, but it's not that big of a deal because once my purse is on it it stays put. The only thing I'm unsure of is if it would move around when using it to hold a tablet or other device.
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution to a daily problem.
customer_reviews.text: So great! Fits perfectly in my 2019 Nissan Rogue. Easy to install and very sturdy. I no longer have to put my pocketbook on the floor. I even bought a set for my mom too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Momofthreekids

customer_reviews.title: THICC ONES
customer_reviews.text: These babies do exactly as they say they’ll do. They even fit my iPhone11 (not the 11max). My only issue is these are super THICC. Which I don’t really like because I have to raise the head rest higher to fit them...
customer_reviews.author: S E P

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for auto owners
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they attach to the headrest and are perfect for hanging a bag or item. No more handbag on the passenger seat! For double duty, the passenger in the back can flip the lever and conver the hook into a phone holder to watch a movie. Smart!
customer_reviews.author: ErinLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Great item, great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive phone holder for my grand daughter, who sits in a rear facing car seat and desperately needed a distraction. These clips are simple, and really effective. They work beautifully, were delivered incredibly fast, and are a great value...there is a clip for each family car. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Strickler

customer_reviews.title: Good Length for Thick Seats
customer_reviews.text: I can't vouch for the media feature, but can say these work well for vehicles with thick seats, such as my 2018 CRV.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CONCEPT
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. It just slips all over. It's a little big for my car. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kim Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great for purse always in the way of shifter.
customer_reviews.text: Product is strong enough for a purse. However, It is not sturdy enough for a cell phone.

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Chevy Cruze, doesn't fit, too small.
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on my headrests on Chevy Cruze 2017.
customer_reviews.author: memyselfi

customer_reviews.title: My girls love them
customer_reviews.text: I keep forgetting that I have them so have rarely used for holding bags, but my girls get plenty of use out of them for their phone/iPod.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product - love it in my car use it daily

customer_reviews.title: phone holder
customer_reviews.text: use them to hold a phone for long vacations for daughter to watch a movie
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: It is very helpful and nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I like so much. I dont need to worry about where to put my bag anymore.

product_meta.title: Car Headrest Hook with Phone Holder Normei 2 in 1 Auto Vehicle Back Seat Headrest Hanger Hooks for Purse Luggage Bags Cloth Grocery (2 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Color:2 PackDo you want to keep your car clean?
Do you want to free your hands to enjoy movies or music?
Are you looking for something that you can not only hang up your handbag but also hold your cell phone?

YES, EVERYBODY, LOOK HERE!

Normei car headrest hangers with phone holder is made of durable material, hard to break, bearing capacity up to 11 lbs for each, 
and the extra silicone prevents scratches and slips when using. They help to hook kid's toys, coat, handbags, 
purse instead of messily placing them on the seat, make your car look neat and clean. They are fits for all auto vehicle, SUV, Van...It's also a wonderful gift for your family members and friends.

Specifications:
Color: Black
Material: ABS plastic + Silica gel
Bearing Capacity: 11lbs(each)
Opening Width: 15mm
Phone Holder Stretch Length: Approx. 2.2inches-3.3inches
Size: Approx. 4.7x2.2x1 inches

Package Included:
2 x 2-in-1 Car Headrest Hooks with Mobile Phone Holder

Notice:
1. Do not install it in a place that may interfere with safe driving. 
2. Do not install it in the front of child seat .
3. Do not hang precious or fragile items.

Not suitable for the following models:
Enclave
Tundra
2015 Impala
2015 Traverse
2019 Traverse
Cadillac head rest
2015 Ford Escape
Chevy Cruze 2017
GMC headrest bars
Jeep Grand Cherokee
Traverse 2015
feature_bullets: NEWEST UPGRATED VERSION: 2 in 1 newest design, integrate car headrest hooks with phone holders, free your hands and enjoy movies or musics from your phone in car during a long and tired trip.

STRONG TIGHTLY YOUR HANDBAGS: The headrest hooks' grip tight with green silicone, and we improve the depth of hook, it sufficient to hold thick-strapped bags, and it comes with lock, so even if the mobile brakes and road vibrates, there is no need to worry it will drop.
KEEP YOUR CAR CLEAN AND TIDY: Kid's toys, clothes, handbags, purse, backpack, shopping bag...Every things take up too much space of your car. Our hook is an expert at solving this problem.
HIDE IT UNDER THE HEADREST: The hooks can be rotated 360 degrees horizontally after installing. When you needn’t to use it, you can switch to hide it under the headrest, safe and save.
FAST INSTALLATION: Upgraded side opening design for easy and fast installation, directly snap the hook onto the pole of the headrest without tools.
